snippet: We're posting quick updates from South by Southwest Interactive on our Tumblr. Monday's posts covered Facebook's new timeline apps, humans as infrastructure, the perils of facial recognition and more.
abstract: We're posting quick updates from South by Southwest Interactive on our Tumblr. Monday's posts covered Facebook's new timeline apps, humans as infrastructure, the perils of facial recognition and more.

headline.main: Snippets From SXSW Interactive: Monday Updates
